recruitment.title: Always Open to New Researchers
recruitment.description: Our lab is always open to prospective students (M.S. / Ph.D.) who possess a deep passion for AI research, regardless of their current degree status. We welcome anyone with a mindset ready to acquire new knowledge and take on new challenges.

research.title: Research & Capabilities
description: Our research focuses primarily on Deep Learning and Deep Reinforcement Learning. We specialize in improving model training performance and optimizing algorithms.
Given the rapidly evolving nature of the AI field, we are looking for candidates capable of quickly grasping the latest SOTA (State-of-the-art) papers and implementing/verifying them through code.
research.note: Note: While we prioritize modeling over embedded hardware control, we are equipped with the necessary hardware. Related research can be pursued upon consultation.

labLife.title: Life at Lab
labLife.description: We foster an autonomous culture where each individual takes ownership of their research. Researchers conduct their work proactively, supported by weekly group lab meetings and 1:1 individual meetings with the professor. These sessions ensure steady growth and help maintain the right research direction.

contactInstruction.title: Contact
contactInstruction.description: If you are interested in joining our lab, please email Prof. Jong-Eun Ha with a brief description of your background/experience and attach your CV. We look forward to hearing from you.
